title: Planned Care Referral Data Set
description: The Planned Care Referral (PCR) Data Set captures all referrals received by NHS Wales provider organisations for the following service requests: Request for Advice, Request for Investigation, Request for Treatment

RecordId.description: This is the field to identify the type of record being submitted.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/recordid.htm

ProviderOrganisationCode.description: The provider code that identifies the health care provider who is responsible for managing the treatment of the patient.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/organisationcodecodeofprovider.htm

LocalPatientIdentifier.description: This is the case record number. It is a unique identifier for a patient within a health care provider.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/localpatientidentifier.htm

NhsNumber.description: The NHS number is the primary identifier of a person, and is a unique identifier for a patient within the NHS in Wales.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/nhsnumber.htm

NhsNumberStatusIndicator.description: The status indicator provides information about the potential accuracy and reliability of the NHS number, as recorded within the Welsh Demographics Service.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/nhsnumberstatusindicator.htm

GpPracticeCode.description: The code of the patient's registered General Practitioner (GP) Practice.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/codeofregisteredgppractice.htm

EthnicGroup.description: This is the ethnic group of the patient, as selected by the patient.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/ethnicgroup.htm

BirthDate.description: Date of birth of patient in the format ccyyMMdd.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/ethnicgroup.htm

OutpatientReferralSource.description: This is a classification which is used to identify the source of referral of each Outpatient Episode or Outpatient Referral.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/sourceofreferraloutpatients.htm

ReferringOrganisationCode.description: The code of the referring organisation.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/referringorganisationcode.htm

ServiceTypeRequested.description: The terms of reference for the referral request.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/servicetyperequested.htm

ReferrerCode.description: The nationally recognised registry code of the person making the referral.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/referrercode.htm

AdministrativeCategory.description: This is to indicate whether the patient is treated as an NHS, private or amenity patient etc.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/administrativecategory.htm

DateOfReferral.description: The date on which the patient was told about the referral, in the format ccyyMMdd.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/dateofpatientreferral.htm

MainSpecialty.description: The code identifying each Main Specialty designated by Royal Colleges.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/mainspecialtyconsultant.htm

ReferrerPriorityType.description: This is the Referrer's assessment of the priority of a request for services.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/referrerprioritytype.htm

ReasonForReferral.description: The reason(s) for the patient requiring involvement with care professionals. These may include any problem, issue or event affecting the patient's health and/ or well being.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/reasonforreferral.htm

ReferralIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for this referral as recorded within the source/sender system.  https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/referralidentifier.htm
